mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.news_id AS "newsId", a.content AS "content", a.content_html AS "contentHtml", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_news_data( id, news_id, content, content_html, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{newsId}, #{content}, #{contentHtml}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: select * from cms_news_data a where a.del_flag='0' and a.news_id=#{newsId} limit 1
